Key Arguments: The government should not be the arbiter of truth or censor information it disagrees with.
Open and honest debate is the solution to misinformation, not government intervention.
The proposed bill threatens freedom of speech and conscience, which are fundamental human rights.
The bill represents government overreach and could lead to authoritarianism and totalitarianism.
Notable Quotes: The solution is open and honest debate.
The proposed bill will not progress Australia but regress it.
This bill represents complete government overreach.
That is not the Australia we want to pass on to the next generation.
